summary.para: Connects the media element to the media sharing engine.

param.name: pFactory
param.para: A pointer to the interface. The media element uses this interface to create the Sharing Engine.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Disconnects the media element from the media sharing engine.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Enables the PlayToConnection object to connect to a media element.
